readable.title: 2937461473_11bbace28c
readable.content: A bunch of children in white are doing a dance routine while another person jumps rope . A crowd of children in white shirts , black shorts and white hats jumping rope . A small child jumping rope as other children clap their hands over their heads nearby . Group of asian children dressed in white shirts and hats performing with a crowd looking on . Several children are all engaging in excersise
